sessions.title: Amazon EC2 Graviton: 40% Better Price-Performance
sessions.description: Learn how AWS Graviton processors deliver industry-leading price-performance for cloud workloads. Explore migration strategies, performance benchmarks, and cost optimization techniques for compute-intensive applications.
speakers: Sarah Chen, Principal Engineer, AWS EC2

sessions.title: Multi-Region Active-Active Architectures
sessions.description: Design globally resilient applications with active-active multi-region architectures. Learn data replication strategies, traffic routing patterns, and disaster recovery best practices.

sessions.title: Zero Trust Security on AWS
sessions.description: Implement zero trust security models using AWS services. Explore identity verification, least privilege access, micro-segmentation, and continuous security monitoring strategies.
speakers: David Kim, Sr. Security Engineer, AWS

sessions.title: VPC Design Patterns for Scalable Architectures
sessions.description: Master VPC networking fundamentals and advanced design patterns. Learn subnet sizing, routing tables, NAT gateway strategies, and multi-account VPC architectures.

sessions.title: Amazon EKS: Production-Grade Kubernetes
sessions.description: Deploy and manage production Kubernetes workloads on Amazon EKS. Explore cluster autoscaling, security best practices, observability, and cost optimization techniques.

sessions.title: Amazon Aurora: Global Database at Scale
sessions.description: Build globally distributed databases with Amazon Aurora. Learn about Aurora Global Database, read replicas, failover strategies, and performance tuning for multi-region applications.

sessions.title: Well-Architected Framework: Best Practices
sessions.description: Apply the AWS Well-Architected Framework to your applications. Review operational excellence, security, reliability, performance efficiency, cost optimization, and sustainability pillars.
speakers: Lisa Martinez, Principal Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: AWS Lambda: Performance Optimization Techniques
sessions.description: Maximize Lambda function performance and minimize costs. Explore cold start reduction, memory optimization, concurrency management, and execution environment best practices.

sessions.title: Cost Optimization: FinOps Best Practices
sessions.description: Implement FinOps practices to manage cloud costs effectively. Learn tagging strategies, rightsizing recommendations, Reserved Instance planning, and cost allocation techniques.
speakers: Kevin O'Brien, Sr. Cost Analyst, AWS

sessions.title: AWS IAM: Advanced Access Control Patterns
sessions.description: Master AWS Identity and Access Management with advanced patterns. Explore permission boundaries, service control policies, cross-account access, and least privilege design.

sessions.title: AWS Transit Gateway: Simplified Network Management
sessions.description: Centralize network connectivity with AWS Transit Gateway. Learn hub-and-spoke architectures, route table design, and integration with AWS Direct Connect and VPN.
speakers: James Chen, Network Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Disaster Recovery Strategies on AWS
sessions.description: Design comprehensive disaster recovery solutions on AWS. Compare backup/restore, pilot light, warm standby, and multi-site active/active DR strategies.

sessions.title: Spot Instances at Scale: Best Practices and Patterns
sessions.description: Reduce compute costs with EC2 Spot Instances. Learn interruption handling, capacity optimization, fleet management, and integration with Auto Scaling groups.

sessions.title: DynamoDB: Single-Digit Millisecond Performance
sessions.description: Build high-performance applications with Amazon DynamoDB. Explore partition key design, global secondary indexes, DynamoDB Streams, and capacity planning.

sessions.title: AWS CEO Keynote: The Future of Cloud Computing
sessions.description: Join AWS CEO for the flagship keynote unveiling the latest innovations in cloud computing, AI/ML, and infrastructure. Discover new services, customer success stories, and the future roadmap.
speakers: Adam Selipsky, CEO, Amazon Web Services
